name: A SNOWMAN/OZZZ2002 Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "SNOWMAN", find a 4-letter word for white stuff that falls from the sky.
questions.explanation:
Snow.

	Snow is one of the many things that fall from the sky as water.  There is also rain, sleet, and hail.

questions.text: Using only letters in "SNOWMAN", find a 3-letter word for an adult male.
questions.explanation:
Man.

	When a boy grows up and becomes an adult male, he is called a man.  A girl who grows up and becomes an adult female is known as a woman.

questions.text: Using only letters from "SNOWMAN" and "OZZZ", find a 3-letter word for a place where you can go to see different animals.
questions.explanation:
Zoo.

	A zoo is a place where all sorts of different animals are kept for you to go and see them.  There are zoos in a lot of different cities, where you can go and pay to see all sorts of neat animals that you otherwise wouldn't see in your backyard!

questions.text: Using only letters from "SNOWMAN" and "OZZZ", find a 3-letter word for the sound a cow makes.
questions.explanation:
Moo.

	A cow makes a mooing sound.  A baby cow is called a calf, and a male cow is a bull.

questions.text: Using only letters in "SNOWMAN", find a 3-letter word for a male child.
questions.explanation:
Son.

	A son is a male child of someone.  A female child would be called a daughter.

questions.text: Using only letters in "SNOWMAN", find a 3-letter word meaning the opposite of lost.
questions.explanation:
Won.

	If you are competing with somebody to do something, and you succeed and they don't, you have won.  They have lost.

questions.text: Using only letters in "SNOWMAN" and "OZZZ", find a 4-letter word meaning 12:00 in the daytime.
questions.explanation:
Noon.

	If it is 12:00 in the daytime, it is in the middle of the day, which is just called "noon".  If it is 12:00 in the middle of the night, it is called "midnight".

questions.text: Using only letters in "SNOWMAN" and "OZZZ", find a 4-letter word for something you see in the sky at night.
questions.explanation:
Moon.

	If you look up at the sky on a dark night, you might see the moon and some stars.  The moon is much bigger than the stars.  The moon shines because it is reflecting light from the sun!

questions.text: Using only letters from "OZZZ", find a 3-letter word, all the same letter, that is used to show that someone is sleeping.
questions.explanation:
zzz.

	If you see the letters "ZZZ", it usually is used to show that someone is sleeping.  Sometimes, if there are three Zs, that person is snoring.

questions.text: Using only letters in "SNOWMAN", find a 3-letter word meaning to have something that is yours.
questions.explanation:
Own.

	If you have something, and that something is yours, it is said that you "own" it.  Also, if you wrote something, for instance, and the writing is yours, it is your "own" handwriting.
